fields.title: Helicopter Crashes in Colombian Drug War, Kills 20
fields.description: BOGOTA, Colombia - A U.S.-made helicopter on an anti-drugs mission crashed in the Colombian jungle on Thursday, killing all 20 Colombian soldiers aboard, the army said.

fields.title: Police Use Taser on Python to Free Man
fields.description: UNIONTOWN, Pa. - A police officer used a Taser to subdue a python that had wrapped itself around a man's arm and would not let go.
